hero.title: About Me
hero.subtitle: Passionate about building scalable systems and exceptional user experiences

paragraphs: With over 5+ years of experience in software engineering, I specialize in building scalable web applications and systems architecture. My expertise spans across frontend technologies like React, TypeScript, and modern frameworks, as well as backend development with Node.js, Python, and cloud infrastructure.

I'm passionate about creating intuitive user interfaces, optimizing performance, and implementing best practices in software development. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and fostering collaborative team environments.
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge through technical writing and mentoring.

whatIDo.title: Frontend Development
whatIDo.description: Building responsive, performant web applications with React, TypeScript, and modern CSS

whatIDo.title: Backend Development
whatIDo.description: Designing and implementing scalable APIs, microservices, and server-side logic

whatIDo.title: System Design
whatIDo.description: Architecting robust, scalable systems with focus on performance and reliability

whatIDo.title: DevOps & Cloud
whatIDo.description: Managing CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and cloud infrastructure deployment

hero.title: Let's Connect
hero.subtitle: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
hero.responseNote: I typically respond within 24-48 hours. For urgent matters, please mention "urgent" in your subject line.
